title: (x) VITAMINWATER LOGO FONT AND BODY COPY. PLEASE HELP!! - Helvetica Condensed {Chris K}
content:
Hello Everyone, I was wondering if ANYONE knew the correct font that was used for this brand. I appreciate all your help! Thanks..I posted a pic up for reference.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100523093354im_/http:/typophile.com/files/vitamin-water-label-2_3847.jpg)
author: grod415

comments.content: that was my first guess..thanks for your help!
